title: Ghostbusters, Volume 6: Trains, Brains, and Ghostly Remains
description: The original Ghostbusters are back in Manhattan, picking up the pieces of their interrupted lives. Ray and Egon throw themselves into their research, while a decision Janine made when she was busting ghosts comes back to haunt her, and to top all of that a ghost ship roams the waters off Long Island.Collects volume 2 issues 5-8 and The New Ghostbusters Stripped back up stories Blah Blah Blob, No Sleep 'Til Brooklyn and Visitation.
author: Erik Burnham
